name: Deimos CM
description:
> *The bloodstone explosion unearthed a portal to a place where few have been‚Äîand none have escaped. Deconstruct the mysteries and learn the true story of one of history's most misunderstood figures.*

‚ö†Ô∏è **Warning**: This is a Kill Run so we require that you have done all of the planned encounters before and are comfortable on the role(s) that you sign up for.

This is a **Challenge Mode** run of the last boss of the last boss of Bastion of the Penitent (Wing 4), <:deimos:703930783257067551> **Deimos**, which is a difficult, punishing boss where any kind of DPS works.

Both power and condi DPS work for this encounter!

<:quick_healer:1176639812900495400> <:alac_healer:1176639815282856017> **Healer Roles:**
- One healer will need to **Tank**. Tanking for the latter boss is toughness-based, so you're expected to take some toughness via gear such as `Minstrel's` or `Giver's` to take aggro.

<:quick_generic:1176639827890937986> <:alac_generic:1176639824292220958> **Boon Roles:**
- Two quickness/alacrity providers must take the **Aegis** role to provide <:aegis:766683009309999104> **Aegis** to the group.

ü©∏ **Other Roles:**
- One player will need to play the ü©∏ **Handkiter** role. This requires a specialised build to do the `Hand Kiting` mechanic. It is a role that requires a lot of survivability and I recommend bringing some toughness trinkets.

Let me know if you have any questions!
templateOverview: This template for a <:deimos:703930783257067551> **Deimos CM** run has **Aegis** roles for the `Mind Crush` attack, alongside the standard special roles.
